articles.title: Only 1.4% of kids, teenagers diagnosed with coronavirus in Canada hospitalized - Global News
articles.description: Statistics from the Public Health Agency of Canada reveal only 1.4 per cent of 10,467 infected kids and teens ended up in hospital with the disease, compared to 13.5 per cent of 84,979 cases involving all ages.
articles.content:
Early data suggests children are much less likely than adults to develop severe cases of COVID-19.
